Posts.Content: Hi, I am not sure what statistics show for for you but I think that your mood could have a bit to do with your health. If you are down and depressed and not taking care of yourself you will get run down and you need to eat right, and take care of yourself. I have breast cancer and had it treated in 2006 and have been okay in that area since. I was not going to let it get me down when I was going through the treatments and I still take medicine everyday but even though this last month was a little shaky and I had a bad experience I still try and eat right, vitamins and think positive even on bad days.
Posts.Title: Breast cancer re-occurance...
